desc: Our Advanced AI-Technology Powered by America Made Qualcomm proc Supports visitors Fever Screening & Management Solution with real time voice Alert for Abnormal Temperature. Suitable for offices ,Clinics,Schools,Hotels etc.Access control allow entry based on temperature, mask detection, Facial recognition, ID Card etc.

layout.text: SAFETY DEVICE FOR THE NEW NORMAL
